MAN.TITLE: meanf
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: weighted mean of a vector or a matrix

DESCRIPTION.P: This function computes the mean of a vector or matrix x. For a vector or matrix x, m=mn(x) returns in scalar m the mean of all the entries of x . m=mn(x,'r') (or, equivalently, m=mn(x,1) ) returns in each entry of the row vector m the mean of each column of x. m=mn(x,'c') (or, equivalently, m=mn(x,2) ) returns in each entry of the column vector m the mean of each row of x.

MAN.AUTHOR: Carlos Klimann

BIBLIO.P: Wonacott, T.H. & Wonacott, R.J.; Introductory Statistics, fifth edition, J.Wiley & Sons, 1990.
